source.textFileName: Dark City 1998 Directors Cut 720p BluRay x264-SiNNERS

subtitles:
1000 11000 Ripped, corrected and synched
by Fingersmaster. Enjoy!

260300 263078 You are confused, aren't you?
Frightened.
263178 264830 That's all right. I can help you.

264930 266430 - Who is this?
- I am a doctor.
266531 267916 Now, you must listen to me.

268017 270628 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

270728 272546 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.
272646 273689 Do you understand me?

273789 275816 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

275916 278402 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278502 281320 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
282114 284866 Hello? Are you there?

343967 346370 Hey, Mr. Murdoch.
The Automat called.
346470 349289 Said you left your wallet there.

349389 352584 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
352684 354560 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
356647 358173 I've been here 3 weeks?

358273 360608 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361318 363069 Day and date.

363737 367141 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367241 369018 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369118 371228 See that you do.
Only thing makes you a guest...

371328 373621 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.

397646 400132 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.
400232 402984 No days off for good behavior.
424965 428535 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
428635 432346 He... he just left not 5 minutes ago.
477684 478684 Hey, sweetie!

479686 481713 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
481813 483272 He wanted to speak with you.

507714 510701 Schreber.
Please, won't you come in?
510801 512885 You must be Emma Murdoch.

513804 516889 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
518725 520434 What is this?

521395 525382 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.
525482 526592 I don't understand.

526692 531722 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.
531822 533098 The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch...

533198 535601 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

535701 539354 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

539454 542524 stemming from your
marital difficulties.

542624 544792 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

545877 548113 When was the last time
that you saw him?

549715 553410 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553510 556455 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556555 558123 But for John's sake,
I would like you...

558223 560792 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

560892 564588 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.
564688 565938 Complete memory loss.
567566 569509 He may be delusional.
569609 571470 Even violent.

574281 577392 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577492 580312 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580412 584691 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

584791 588127 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
602142 603961 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
604061 606755 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

606855 610733 Mr... was it
"J"... something... Murdoch?
614905 618407 What's your name? Justin? Jerry?

622120 624147 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.
624247 625607 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
625707 626817 Hi. Jack Murdoch.

674131 677242 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead."
677342 680746 I said, "Listen, 3 weeks is 3 weeks."
680846 681997 Where's our lucky winner?
682097 684875 Upstairs, sir, room, uh, 614.
684975 687669 Another call girl.
691481 693133 Evening, Husselbeck.
693233 694509 Inspector Bumstead.
694609 697095 Your lace is untied.
709749 711193 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711293 713862 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

713962 716255 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723513 727433 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

770477 772563 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.
772863 774371 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774471 775775 When... when, when did I do that?
775875 776883 When you was last here.

776983 780053 - When... when was that?
- When you left your wallet.
780153 781946 You expect me to remember?
784741 787993 Hello. Excuse me.
788912 790814 No, no, seriously.

809349 811418 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.
811518 812602 And where's home?
812702 815007 Haven't you mugs got anything better to do?

815397 817591 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

817691 819718 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

819818 822528 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
825865 827533 Aw, go on, get out of here.
838044 840296 Round and round she goes.
842716 846844 Where she stops? Nobody knows.

850015 853084 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
853184 854586 I believe so, sir.
854686 857130 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857230 859424 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859524 861650 to expire at a good time of night.
862652 864612 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?
868283 869825 I guess he'd seen enough.
876916 878116 So, Husselbeck...
879177 881677 what kind of killer do you think...
882578 885659 stops to save a dying fish?
885759 886759 You've got me, sir.
886861 888870 Bumstead, what took you?

888970 892165 This killer's been running circles around us,
thanks to Walenski.
892265 894000 With all due respect, Chief Inspector...
894100 895700 I've known Eddie a long time.
895800 897000 He's a good cop.

897103 901258 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
901358 902864 Let me talk to Bumstead!
903234 904511 Come on, let's go.
906029 907565 Frank, Frank!
909780 910780 Get his arm!
910880 911880 They're watching us!
911980 912980 On your feet.
913080 914435 There's no way out!
914537 915814 Don't make us hurt you.
915914 917723 God, can't you see?!
921002 922279 Let me go, let me go!
922379 923837 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not...

924923 927132 - What was that?
- Walenski.
935517 938628 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
938728 941047 What did I ever do to inherit this?
941147 942173 Where do you begin?

942273 947220 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so...

947320 950823 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952409 954743 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958289 961417 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
964796 966547 What is this, some kind of joke?
970802 972177 Don't throw anything away.
978309 979393 Inspector Bumstead.

981688 984398 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985191 987010 Take it to the front desk.
987110 988944 They told me to come see you.
990697 992906 His name's John Murdoch.

993950 996936 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997036 1002150 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002250 1004960 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006129 1010033 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010133 1011701 How long have you been married?
1011801 1013036 Nearly four years.
1013936 1015737 Why do you ask?

1016097 1019125 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019225 1022837 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1022937 1024396 No, I never take it off.

1030945 1034990 Do these names
mean anything to you?
1040330 1042247 No. Who are these women?

1043124 1044833 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045543 1047320 Are you going to accuse him
of something?
1047420 1049656 Maybe. Maybe murder.
1049756 1050898 Whose murder?
1056888 1059098 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059198 1060525 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060625 1062711 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.
1062811 1064212 Mrs. Murdoch, if you please.

1064312 1066772 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain...
1069067 1071109 I'll be right out.
1095260 1097495 Have we met before?

1097595 1101166 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.
1101266 1102891 What's your name, honey?
1106379 1108438 Well, that's an appropriate name.
1116489 1117656 I was just thinking.
1124664 1127901 seems kind of dangerous...

1130044 1131738 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1131838 1135007 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136217 1138703 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220551 1224262 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.
1228518 1232030 We might ask the same question, yes?

1315605 1318841 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1318941 1320802 It is said he is able to tune.
1320902 1322220 Impossible.

1322320 1325056 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325156 1327517 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1327617 1330520 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1330620 1334190 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334290 1336401 But this one was different, yes?

1336501 1338111 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338211 1340154 He has failed to report in.

1340254 1343324 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1343424 1346426 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1349472 1352000 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1352100 1354976 Mr. Book, does he know?
1356312 1358146 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359107 1361926 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362026 1364945 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366030 1368516 Mr. Night, you will take the East.
1368616 1371352 Mr. Face, you the West.
1371452 1373479 Mr. Glove, the South.
1373579 1375831 Mr. Shade, the North.
1377375 1380335 We must have this man.

1393975 1398979 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1402650 1406111 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1449822 1451990 I've been so worried about you.
1455369 1457396 Are you punishing me?

1457496 1460066 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...
1460166 1461192 I don't appreciate it.

1461292 1463335 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466172 1468616 I found these keys in my pocket...
1468716 1471369 so I assume I live here.
1471469 1473162 You supposed to be my wife?
1473262 1475248 Supposed to be?
1479685 1482839 don't know who I am, do you?
1482939 1484090 Your doctor called me.

1484190 1485591 He was worried
that this might happen.
1489820 1491764 he gave me his card.
1491864 1494350 He's desperate to find you.

1501290 1503317 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503417 1506211 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1506921 1509047 I had an affair.
1510132 1512550 You were angry at me.
1515012 1516789 The police are looking for you.
1516889 1519125 I know. I saw the papers.
1519225 1521810 "Killer stalks city streetwalkers."
1525314 1528843 I was with one of those women...
1528943 1530735 before I came here tonight.
1531404 1533014 I don't understand.
1533114 1534572 I... I met her outside an Automat.
1536075 1538603 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1538703 1542265 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.
1542665 1544294 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1544395 1547352 but whoever I am, I'm still me
and I'm not a killer.
1553292 1554893 I believe you.

1563093 1565630 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1565730 1568123 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570192 1572762 I didn't know he was still here.
1575197 1577949 Hold it right there, mister!
1579327 1581229 Wait. You have the wrong man.
1581329 1582396 Stand aside, will you, please?
1582496 1584023 I didn't kill anyone.

1584123 1587250 Right now what you are is a suspect.
Turn yourself in.
1588169 1589695 I'll listen to whatever you have to say.

1589795 1591671 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.
1594467 1595993 There's someone after me.

1596093 1599163 There's this... this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599263 1601890 And I don't even know if...
They're not even...
1602641 1604835 Yeah, who's gonna listen to a madman?
1604935 1606671 Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1611734 1614486 No one ever listens to me.
1619992 1621159 Murdoch, stop!
1663786 1664829 How much further?
1664929 1666371 We're almost there, buddy.

1669041 1672278 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672378 1675239 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675339 1678049 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to...
1680886 1682538 Or is it the cross...

1682638 1686208 You know, that's funny.
I... I can't seem to remember...

1686308 1688601 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693274 1696761 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1696861 1698637 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1698737 1700947 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709248 1711484 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1711584 1716197 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716297 1718908 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719008 1722620 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1722720 1725164 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725264 1727833 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1727933 1731629 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1731729 1733672 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1735649 1737635 Let's take you, for instance.
1737735 1741013 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1741113 1743198 Consumed by details.
1743949 1745867 I would say your life is...
1747161 1748161 rather lonely.

1748954 1751539 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1792915 1797252 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1806804 1811432 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812351 1815019 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817439 1820551 - I'm sorry. I...
- Failed to report in, yes.

1820651 1823220 I was frightened.
I... I have a weak heart, you know.

1823320 1827099 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827199 1829810 We found this
in his hotel room.

1829910 1833772 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?
1833872 1834899 I tried to imprint him...

1834999 1837067 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837167 1839195 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.
1839295 1840404 He has no memories, then?

1840504 1843782 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1843882 1847620 I... I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1847720 1849246 You have had strays
before, right?

1849346 1852974 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853392 1856128 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856228 1860466 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860566 1862259 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862359 1866863 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1867698 1870100 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1870200 1872619 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...
1873203 1874939 no more delays, yes?

1875039 1879751 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1887343 1890219 You appear quite frail, Doctor.

1890971 1894474 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1914370 1916037 - How is he?
- The same.
1917414 1919999 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1926340 1927840 Come in, Frank.
1930719 1932637 Close the door.

1940062 1943382 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1943482 1945483 It's an interesting case.

1946652 1951432 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1952783 1955060 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955160 1959356 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1959456 1961233 Nothing happened, Frank.

1961333 1965404 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.
1965504 1967380 Thinking in circles.
1968298 1969382 There's no way out.

1971176 1973052 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1977808 1980085 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1980185 1981894 She's not my wife.

1983397 1986300 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.
1986400 1988260 What makes you say that?

1988360 1990445 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1991905 1993364 As much as the next guy.

1993991 1997061 See, I've been trying
to remember things...

1997161 1999772 clearly remember things
from my past.

1999872 2005277 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.
2005377 2006612 None of it seems real.

2006712 2010032 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010132 2013619 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2013719 2015553 Somebody totally different.

2020309 2022961 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie?
2023061 2026063 Something to do with the case.

2026648 2030052 There is no case.
There never was!

2030152 2034572 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2075072 2077766 Tonight's requirements are...

2077866 2082563 12 family photo albums,
9 personal diaries...

2082663 2087526 17 love letters,
assorted childhood photographs...

2087626 2091697 26 wallets,
ID's and social security cards.
2091797 2093881 These do bring back memories.
2096260 2098412 This one is still warm.
2100347 2103500 The recollections of a great lover?
2103600 2106545 A catalog of conquests?
2106645 2108145 We will soon find out.

2109523 2114094 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114194 2118573 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2121869 2124579 A touch of unhappy childhood.
2130419 2133129 A dash of teenage rebellion.
2134882 2137618 And last, but not least...
2137718 2139912 a tragic death in the family.
2151732 2153425 Why does Murdoch not sleep...
2153525 2155344 during the tuning as the others do?

2155444 2159515 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2159615 2162434 A... A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162534 2165854 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2165954 2168440 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168540 2171819 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2171919 2174947 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...
2175047 2176498 and it's going to bite you on your...

2180218 2183789 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2183889 2187709 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune...
2187809 2189294 Is absurd, I know...
2189394 2191395 but what other explanation is there?
2243407 2244782 Shut it down.
2260424 2261799 Get your paper right here!
2273311 2274963 It's driving me crazy.
2276523 2278258 And they call my job "unskilled".
2278358 2279593 You think you've got it tough?

2279693 2281769 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282487 2286615 Anyways, Frederickson says
he'll take me off the damn night shift soon.
2287159 2289035 Well, it's about time, dear.
2390262 2394306 Can anybody hear me?!
2395392 2398853 Let the tuning commence.

2558430 2561416 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2561516 2563809 Jane and little Matthew.
2567605 2569690 Jane and little Matthew.
2599804 2602415 The rich get richer.

2602515 2606143 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.
2659364 2661268 Dr. Schreber, I presume.
2664202 2666313 That's no way to greet a patient, Doctor.
2666413 2668106 If that's what you are, Doctor?
2668206 2669566 Mr. Murdoch, please, I...

2669666 2671743 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671843 2673862 Please keep your voice down.

2673962 2675922 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676022 2678616 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.
2678716 2679951 We can't talk here.

2680051 2682203 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll...

2682303 2683663 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2683763 2685040 I want some answers now!
2685140 2686249 Who are they?
2686349 2688209 Why are they trying to kill me?
2694732 2697802 My God. You really can do it.

2699237 2701431 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701531 2703558 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2703658 2706895 They call it tuning. That is how they make
the buildings change.

2706995 2709481 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709581 2712359 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712459 2714736 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2714836 2716420 We can take the city back.
2722927 2724887 My glasses, please.

2771976 2774587 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2774687 2776965 lollygagging around as he did.

2777065 2779884 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2779984 2782694 And well you should have, darling.
2783029 2784404 He attacked me.
2785365 2786615 I don't know where he has gone.
2787700 2789576 Come, Dr. Schreber.
2790620 2792147 We have much to do.

2906944 2910390 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910490 2914852 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2914952 2917397 Mr. Book. There is a... a problem.

2917497 2920775 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2920875 2924529 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2924629 2927240 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2927340 2932036 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2932136 2933830 He's becoming like us.
2933930 2938418 So we must become like him.
2938518 2940878 The good doctor has done as we asked?

2940978 2944472 The life and times of John Murdoch,
Volume 2.
2946651 2948886 We must not do this.

2948986 2952473 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952573 2955184 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?
2955284 2957562 Everywhere he goes...

2957662 2960231 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960331 2965236 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965336 2967947 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t...
2968047 2971117 Yes. Poor, poor Mr...
2971217 2973036 We have not forgotten.

2973136 2980392 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this sacrifice
for the greater good...

2982520 2987634 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2987734 2991220 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2998411 3000203 This may sting a bit.
3043122 3046666 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053382 3056786 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things.
3056886 3058955 "Brings back memories, doesn't it?
3059055 3060832 "Stop by sometime.
3060932 3062667 "We'll see if we can't hook ourselves...
3062767 3064043 "another mermaid.
3064143 3066102 "Love to Emma. Karl."
3074821 3076571 Karl Harris.

3094257 3097034 Excuse me. Can you tell me
the way to Avenue C?
3097134 3098343 Try the subway.
3102348 3103875 You got a problem, pal?
3103975 3106993 You, uh, been working here long?
3109175 3111658 No days off for good behavior.
3136382 3139551 We're looking for John Murdoch.
3173544 3175571 She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3175671 3177740 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3177840 3180368 We thought his imprint
would allow us to track him, yes...
3180468 3182829 but instead we have been brought here.
3182929 3184497 This is irrational.
3184597 3186874 Instincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

3186974 3190336 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190436 3194882 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.
3194982 3196968 He does not care about our job.
3197068 3199846 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
3199946 3201454 If you were Murdoch...
3204607 3206201 I were Murdoch...
3207828 3209647 I would remember...

3209747 3213333 how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

3218089 3221591 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
3225262 3227582 Leave me alone with her.
3227682 3229432 There's work to be done.
3232937 3235172 All change, platform 3.
3235372 3238050 Platform 3, all change.
3238150 3239802 All change? Excuse me.
3239902 3241178 How do I get to the end of the line?
3241278 3242821 You want the Express.
3250579 3253474 No trains leave on platform 7.

3253674 3255192 - You want platform 2.
- Got it. Thanks a lot.
3256395 3257797 How come that train didn't stop?
3257937 3259337 That's the Express.
3260673 3262533 There's no way out, you know?

3262633 3265552 You can't get out of the city.

3268764 3270458 The one they've been looking for.

3273102 3275562 At least, in this life, I was.

3283195 3285222 till no one knows

3302173 3303590 I figured a way out.

3319607 3321900 This was to be his home.

3337825 3340060 And I know where to find her.

3363109 3365017 But imagine a life...
3365177 3367047 alien to yours...

3367947 3369598 in which your memories

3398519 3401088 There used to be a ferry

3409655 3411489 on this very spot.

3419039 3421859 I met my wife at this place.

3576280 3578557 Shell Beach, your hometown.

3586665 3588651 You gotta have some idea.

3620157 3621366 Where are they now?
3622326 3624270 They're dead, Johnny.

3694773 3696293 I wanted to talk to her.

3696394 3698668 I thought maybe

3699978 3702238 Stay here.

3713584 3715084 Yeah, this is Bumstead.

3755584 3757418 She saw what happened here.

3787574 3790201 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3815143 3816394 It's beautiful.
3818981 3822217 It was a gift from my mother.

3824861 3827196 I keep it with me to remind me of her.
3833912 3836023 It's a funny thing, though.

3868739 3870549 even if it is for just a night.

3886006 3888825 You're tired. Anything's possible.

3890344 3893929 get some sleep. We'll straighten

3919790 3922667 "Guide to Shell Beach

3978114 3980179 Johnny, if you're in some kind of trouble...

4072108 4073427 There's no escape.

4086748 4088191 in order to learn.
4089709 4091111 About you, Mr. Murdoch...

4337457 4341352 And I'm not talking about some distant,

4358632 4360337 and the night never ends here.

4395682 4397015 Explain this.

4431426 4432994 the thing you're supposed to have done...

4435071 4436331 What do you mean?

4476221 4480291 I so vividly remember meeting you.

4492528 4493612 just one more minute.
4500119 4502246 I love you, John.

4666536 4668688 Yes. Yes, of course.

4698551 4700569 You're not crazy, John.

4711080 4712523 Everything you need to know...
4712623 4714901 all the answers are in this syringe.

4786113 4787432 You won't find anything there...

4789492 4792035 If you've been there,

4793162 4794746 We'll see for ourselves.

4838906 4840106 fishing you out of the canal.

4854773 4856808 Who are you people?

4868988 4870905 You will be soon, yes.
4874994 4877871 I have another use for her first.

4884587 4889799 First there was darkness.

4891969 4894262 They abducted us and brought us here.
4895556 4898251 This city, everyone in it...
4898351 4899669 is their experiment.

4899769 4902588 They mix and match our memories

4902688 4905740 trying to divine what makes us unique.
4906150 4908844 One day, a man might be an inspector.
4908944 4911847 The next, someone entirely different.

4911947 4915184 When they want to study

4915284 4919079 they simply imprint one of their citizens

4920206 4924209 arrange a family for him,

4925002 4926044 even a lost wallet.
4926629 4928296 Then they observe the results.

4929757 4933786 Will a man, given the history

4933886 4937832 Or are we, in fact, more

4937932 4942878 This business of you being a killer

4942978 4945756 You have had dozens of lives

4945856 4949192 You just happened to wake up

4949985 4952054 Why are they doing all of this?
4952154 4955474 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955574 4958060 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4958160 4960479 They think they
can find the human soul...

4960579 4963649 if they understand
how our memories work.
4963749 4965042 All they have are collective memories.
4965142 4967820 They share one group mind.
4967920 4969322 They're dying, you see?

4969422 4972783 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4972883 4974702 They think we can save them.

4974802 4977220 - Where do I fit in?

4977847 4980682 You resisted my attempt

4985354 4988674 Somehow you have developed

4988774 4990267 That is how they change things.
4990367 4991952 That is how they built this city.

4992052 4994613 They have machines buried deep

4994713 4998533 that allow them

4999410 5001812 They control everything here,

5001912 5005232 That's why it's always dark.

5005332 5006525 So why do they need you?

5006625 5010946 When they first brought us here,

5011046 5014825 So they could store the information,

5014925 5017411 and give us back new memories

5017511 5021139 But they still needed an artist

5022975 5026087 I understood the intricacies

5026187 5028631 better than they ever could...

5028731 5031425 so they allowed me

5031525 5032885 because they needed them.

5032985 5035445 But they made me

5043829 5046607 Can you imagine

5046707 5048359 to erase your own past?

5048459 5051795 What about my past?

5052713 5055423 Shell Beach, Uncle Karl.
5056175 5057467 What about this?
5058385 5060204 This was blank when I found it!
5060304 5062289 You still don't understand, John.

5062389 5065501 You were never a boy...

5065601 5068337 Your entire history is an illusion,

5068437 5070256 as it is with all of us.

5070356 5072800 You made those drawings

5072900 5074776 You say they brought us here.
5083702 5085396 I don't remember.
5085496 5087247 None of us remember that...
5087957 5089483 what we once were...
5089583 5091944 what we might have been...
5092044 5093419 somewhere else.
5110896 5112798 I've taken you this far.
5112898 5114967 You don't need me anymore.
5160988 5163724 There is no ocean, John.
5163824 5167895 There is nothing beyond the city.
5167995 5171331 The only place home exists...
5173167 5175168 is in your head.
5222216 5224384 And now you know the truth.

5292995 5295856 You'll allow yourself

5295956 5298108 or it will result in

5298208 5300694 What do I care?

5300794 5301862 She's nothing to me!

5301962 5306116 But you do still care,

5306216 5308827 You see, I have become the monster...

5312723 5316642 Shall I end her life now

5319688 5321840 Don't hurt her, please!

5378622 5380689 Kill him! Kill him!
5384419 5387130 Kill him! Kill him!
5389800 5392286 He is powerful, yes.

5396890 5400210 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400310 5403964 It is time for our experiment

5404064 5406717 We no longer need the other subjects.
5406817 5410387 The time for study is over.
5410487 5412547 It is time to be one...
5412948 5414999 with John Murdoch.
5421373 5423150 It is time, Doctor.
5427588 5430282 Shut it down!
5430382 5433551 Shut it down forever!
5447441 5449635 What are you doing?

5449735 5454280 They want to imprint you

5455616 5459744 They want to make you one of them,

5465918 5468153 Imprint, Doctor.

5470130 5473132 The pain will only last a moment.
5484645 5485937 Remember, John.

5487189 5489091 You'll rise to greater heights

5489191 5490983 One day when you're older,

5495197 5497975 That's it, John.

5498075 5501228 Now remember what I told you.

5501328 5503063 John, remember.

5503163 5505941 You're probably wondering

5506041 5508527 It is because I have

5508627 5510654 All of these memories

5510754 5512406 to teach you about the strangers.

5512506 5515633 Give you a lifetime of knowledge

5518470 5520789 You will survive, John.
5520889 5523125 You will find strength within yourself...
5523225 5525127 and you will prevail.
5527354 5528497 Hi, Uncle Karl.
5532401 5534428 You're getting the hang of it, John.
5534528 5536570 Maybe one day I'll be working for you.

5537406 5540559 This is the machine the strangers use

5540659 5542477 The machine that changes their world.
5542577 5544062 You must take control of it.
5544162 5545731 You must make the machine yours.
5545831 5547900 I know you can beat them, John.
5548000 5550501 But you must concentrate.
5552713 5553796 Something's wrong.
5562431 5565125 There is no time for romance, John.
5565225 5567502 The world can be what you make it.

5569646 5572132 You have the power

5572232 5573733 but you must act now!
5858602 5860003 I knew you could do it, John.
5860103 5862088 You have their power now.
5862188 5863965 You control their machines.
5866234 5868970 She is not Emma anymore, John.

5876040 5877549 has been destroyed.

6110728 6112172 how you feel.
6112272 6114883 You know how I was supposed to feel.

6123908 6127244 Well, you're not going to find it...

6247490 6250117 I think that's it just over there.

6290241 6291700 John Murdoch.
